name: Miimo
0:
”Alexa, tell Miimo to cut the lawn”
”Alexa, tell Miimo where it is”
”Alexa, tell Miimo to go home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: miimo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can talk to Miimo! Just ask Amazon Alexa to tell Miimo to cut, pause or finish. You can even ask Miimo where he is or when he is next going to cut your lawn!

To get started, all you have to do is ensure that you have already installed your Miimo, downloaded the Mii-monitor app and set up a user ID. Then simply link to your Amazon Alexa account by clicking the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app. 

Once you have successfully linked your accounts, you can start using the Miimo skill.

You can instruct Miimo to mow the lawn simply by asking: 
"Alexa, tell Miimo to cut the grass"
"Alexa, tell Miimo to mow my lawn"

You can instruct Miimo to return to the docking station, simply by asking:
"Alexa, tell Miimo to go home"
"Alexa, tell Miimo to return to docking station"

If you would like to ask for status, you can say things like:
"Alexa, ask Miimo for status"
"Alexa, ask Miimo what it is doing"

If you are interested in your cutting schedule, you could ask things like:
"Alexa, ask Miimo for the schedule"
"Alexa, ask Miimo for the calendar".

The "Miimo" skill will work with Miimo HRM40 Live and HRM70 Live.
